item.title: marengo chicken
item.description: Ingredients 1 tender chicken (about 1-1-2 kilos), broken into 4 pieces 1-2 cup olive oil 3 tablespoons cognac 1 medium onion, chopped 2 tablespoons flour 1 cup dry white wine 1 cube of chicken bouill√≥n 1-4 cup mashed tomatoes 3 sprigs of parsley 1 pinch of dried thyme 1 bay leaf, small 200 grams of fresh mushrooms slices 1 cup toasted croutons Directions Chicken pieces, including giblets, are sprinkled with salt and pepper.
